[[=]]
+ Welcome to Reading and Writing Club!
[[/=]]

----

[[div class="paper round"]]
++ **About Reading Club**
Reading Club is a live reading session held on the official [https://discord.com/invite/scp SCP Wiki Discord Server]. [[footnote]] Please note that you must be 16 or older to join. [[/footnote]] Sessions are typically based in one of three regions: America (US), Europe (EU), and Oceania (AU).

During the beginning of a Reading Club, users are invited to join a voice channel, where they may follow along as the session's host(s) read aloud various articles on the wiki. [[footnote]] Audience members may even be asked to come onstage and lend their voice! [[/footnote]] These articles are selected by the hosts, but listeners are free to provide their own suggestions in the channel //#club-recommendations// for current or future sessions. [[footnote]] We ask you choose articles below +80 upvotes that are not your own. [[/footnote]]

Once the reading is complete, a discussion about the article is held. Here, audience members can join the hosts onstage to express their thoughts and opinions. Listeners may use //#no-mic// to chat as well. Once the discussion is finished, we move on to the next article. The average session lasts for roughly 2 hours.
[[/div]]

[[div class="paper round"]]
++ **About Writing Club**
Writing Club is a seminar held by the hosts regarding the various parts of the writing process. Sessions will have a central topic that is discussed, with audience members free to join onstage to provide their own thoughts, opinions, and insights on the subject.
[[/div]]

[[div class="paper round"]]
++ **About the Hosts**
Club Hosts are the people who organize each session. As of now, our current hosts are:
* [[*user Corax D]]
* [[*user Dino--Draws]]
* [[*user DrBleep]]
* [[*user Guaire]]
* [[*user Intercedent]]
* [[*user psychicprogrammer]]
* [[*user RuraScarlet]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="paper round"]]
++ **About the Archive**
Below is an archive of every article featured in Reading Club. Recordings for our past Reading and Writing Clubs are listed here as well and can be found on our [https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/scp-wiki-archives Spotify]. Podcast episodes are edited by:
* [[*user Yossipossi]]
* [[*user fairydoctor]]
* [[*user UncertaintyCrossing]]
* [[*user psychicprogrammer]]
[[/div]]
